attributes.action: Raise the minimum wage to £7.00 per hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What with the increase of everyday living, we fill the standard min wage of now days does not cover the cost of living, for example people who work within retail, bars and office's are ave bringing home only £200 a week people are being forced to get in debt just to put food on the table, we propose the min wage should be at a modest £7.00 an hour bringing the ave wage to £280 a week, which should just about cover the cost of living

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Raise the minimum wage to £7.00 per hour."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11267.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/min-wage/
